department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: coarse woven black unlined jacket with cuffs; front longer than back; side vents; front edges woven--striped bands with applique and braid embroidery; PR has satin stitch floral embroidery; two embroidered ties; neck band has tape applique in green with gold trim and braid embroidery; shoulders have applique and gold trim--horizontal; sleeve tops, dark pink satin with green braid embroidery--elaborate pattern trimmed in narrow gold tape and gold sequins; neck back faced with indigo fabric
medium: Cotton, silk, gold metallic tape, sequins
title: Jacket
